name: Watch Wheels
description:
For the first time ever you can enjoy top down racing on your Apple Watch. Use the digital crown to drift your car around tight corners. Knock the AI opponents out of your way and try to beat your best time for each track.

FEATURES:
- Play on your Watch or Phone
- 4 different tracks to unlock
- 3 levels of difficulty
- 3 AI opponents
- Beautiful pixel art
- Rocking soundtrack
- Best times scoreboards for Watch and Phone
- Automatic acceleration

How to play:
Turn the digital crown up and down to turn your car. Press the screen to engage the brakes or reverse.
